verses.verse: The sons<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> [were] Perez,<WH6557> Hezron,<WH2696> Carmi,<WH3756> Hur,<WH2354> and Shobal.<WH7732>

And Reaiah<WH7211> the son<WH1121> of Shobal<WH7732> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Jahath,<WH3189> and Jahath<WH3189> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Ahumai<WH267> and Lahad.<WH3855> These<WH428> [were] the families<WH4940> of the Zorathites.<WH6882>
And these<WH428> [were] the sons of Etam:<WH1> Jezreel,<WH5862> Ishma,<WH3157> and Idbash;<WH3457> and the name<WH3031> of their sister<WH8034> [was] Hazzelelponi.<WH269>

And Penuel<WH6439> [was] the father of Gedor,<WH1> and Ezer<WH1446> the father of Hushah.<WH5829> These<WH1> [were] the sons<WH2364> of Hur,<WH428> the first-born of Ephrathah,<WH1121> the father of Bethlehem.<WH2354>
And Ashhur,<WH806> the father of Tekoa,<WH1> had<WH8620> two<WH1961> wives,<WH8147> Helah<WH802> and Naarah.<WH2458>
And Naarah<WH5292> bore<WH3205> him Ahuzzam,<WH275> Hepher,<WH2660> Temeni,<WH8488> and Haahashtari.<WH326> These<WH428> were the sons<WH1121> of Naarah.<WH5292>
And the sons<WH1121> of Helah<WH2458> [were] Zereth,<WH6889> Izhar<WH3328> and Ethnan.<WH869>
And Koz<WH6976> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Anub<WH6036> and Zobebah,<WH6637> and the families<WH4940> of Aharhel<WH316> the son<WH1121> of Harum.<WH2037>

And Jabez<WH3258> was more<WH4480> honorable<WH3513> than<WH4480> his brothers,<WH251> and his mother<WH517> named<WH7121> <WH8034> him Jabez<WH3258> saying,<WH559> "Because<WH3588> I bore<WH3205> [him] with pain.<WH6090>"

Now Jabez<WH3258> called<WH7121> on the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> saying,<WH559> "Oh<WH518> that Thou wouldst bless<WH1288> me indeed,<WH1288> and enlarge<WH7235> my border,<WH1366> and that Thy hand<WH3027> might be with me, and that Thou wouldst keep<WH6213> [me] from harm,<WH9567> that [it] may not pain<WH6087> me!" And God<WH430> granted<WH935> him what<WH834> he requested.<WH7592>
And Chelub<WH3620> the brother<WH251> of Shuhah<WH7746> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Mehir,<WH4243> who<WH1931> was the father of Eshton.<WH1>
And Eshton<WH850> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Beth-rapha and Paseah,<WH6454> and Tehinnah<WH8468> the father of Ir-nahash. These<WH1> are the men<WH428> of Recah.<WH376>
Now the sons<WH1121> of Kenaz<WH7073> [were] Othniel<WH6274> and Seraiah.<WH8304> And the son<WH1121> of Othniel<WH6274> [was] Hathath.<WH2867>

And Meonothai<WH4587> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Ophrah,<WH6084> and Seraiah<WH8304> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Joab<WH3097> the father of Ge-harashim, for they were craftsmen.<WH1>
And the sons<WH1121> of Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Jephunneh<WH3312> [were] Iru,<WH5900> Elah<WH425> and Naam;<WH5277> and the son<WH1121> of Elah<WH425> [was] Kenaz.<WH7073>
And the sons<WH1121> of Jehallelel<WH3094> [were] Ziph<WH2128> and Ziphah,<WH2129> Tiria<WH8493> and Asarel.<WH840>

And the sons<WH1121> of Ezrah<WH5834> [were] Jether,<WH3500> Mered,<WH4778> Epher,<WH6081> and Jalon.<WH3210> (And these<WH428> are the sons<WH1121> of Bithia<WH1332> the daughter<WH1323> of Pharaoh,<WH6547> whom<WH834> Mered<WH4778> took<WH3947>) and she conceived<WH2029> [and bore] Miriam,<WH4813> Shammai,<WH8060> and Ishbah<WH3431> the father of Eshtemoa.<WH1>
And his Jewish<WH3057> wife<WH802> bore<WH3205> Jered<WH3382> the father of Gedor,<WH1> and Heber<WH1446> the father of Soco,<WH2268> and Jekuthiel<WH1> the father of Zanoah.<WH7755>
And the sons<WH1121> of the wife<WH802> of Hodiah,<WH1941> the sister<WH269> of Naham,<WH5163> [were] the fathers of Keilah<WH1> the Garmite<WH7084> and Eshtemoa<WH1636> the Maacathite.<WH851>
And the sons<WH1121> of Shimon<WH7889> [were] Amnon<WH550> and Rinnah,<WH7441> Benhanan<WH1135> and Tilon.<WH8436> And the sons<WH1121> of Ishi<WH3469> [were] Zoheth<WH2105> and Ben-zoheth.

The sons<WH1121> of Shelah<WH7956> the son<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> [were] Er<WH6147> the father of Lecah<WH1> and Laadah<WH3922> the father of Mareshah,<WH3935> and the families<WH1> of the house<WH4762> of the linen<WH4940> workers<WH1004> at Beth-ashbea;
and Jokim,<WH3137> the men<WH376> of Cozeba,<WH3578> Joash,<WH3060> Saraph,<WH8315> who<WH834> ruled<WH1166> in Moab,<WH4124> and Jashubi-lehem. And the records<WH1697> are ancient.<WH6267>
These<WH1992> were the potters<WH3335> and the inhabitants<WH3427> of Netaim<WH5196> and Gederah;<WH1448> they lived<WH3427> there<WH8033> with the king<WH4428> for his work.<WH4399>
The sons<WH1121> of Simeon<WH8095> [were] Nemuel<WH5241> and Jamin,<WH3226> Jarib,<WH3402> Zerah,<WH2226> Shaul;<WH7586>
Shallum<WH7967> his son,<WH1121> Mibsam<WH4017> his son,<WH1121> Mishma<WH4927> his son.<WH1121>
And the sons<WH1121> of Mishma<WH4927> [were] Hammuel<WH2536> his son,<WH1121> Zaccur<WH2139> his son,<WH1121> Shimei<WH8096> his son.<WH1121>

Now Shimei<WH8096> had sixteen<WH8337> <WH6240> sons<WH1121> and six<WH8337> daughters;<WH1323> but his brothers<WH251> did not have<WH369> many<WH7227> sons,<WH1121> nor<WH3808> did all<WH3605> their family<WH4940> multiply<WH7235> like<WH5704> the sons<WH1121> of Judah.<WH3063>
And they lived<WH3427> at Beersheba,<WH884> Moladah,<WH4137> and Hazar-shual,
at Bilhah,<WH9053> Ezem,<WH6107> Tolad,<WH8434>
Bethuel,<WH9066> Hormah,<WH2767> Ziklag,<WH6860>
Beth-marcaboth, Hazar-susim, Beth-biri, and Shaaraim.<WH8189> These<WH428> [were] their cities<WH5892> until<WH5704> the reign<WH4427> of David.<WH1732>
And their villages<WH9161> [were] Etam,<WH5862> Ain,<WH5871> Rimmon,<WH9558> Tochen,<WH8507> and Ashan,<WH6228> five<WH2568> cities;<WH5892>

and all<WH3605> their villages<WH9161> that [were] around<WH5439> the same<WH428> cities<WH5892> as far<WH5704> as Baal.<WH9058> These<WH2088> [were] their settlements,<WH4186> and they have their genealogy.<WH3187>
And Meshobab<WH4877> and Jamlech<WH3230> and Joshah<WH3144> the son<WH1121> of Amaziah,<WH558>
and Joel<WH3100> and Jehu<WH3058> the son<WH1121> of Joshibiah,<WH3143> the son<WH1121> of Seraiah,<WH8304> the son<WH1121> of Asiel,<WH6221>
and Elioenai,<WH454> Jaakobah,<WH3291> Jeshohaiah,<WH3439> Asaiah,<WH6222> Adiel,<WH5717> Jesimiel,<WH3450> Benaiah,<WH1141>
Ziza<WH2124> the son<WH1121> of Shiphi,<WH8230> the son<WH1121> of Allon,<WH438> the son<WH1121> of Jedaiah,<WH3042> the son<WH1121> of Shimri,<WH8113> the son<WH1121> of Shemaiah;<WH8098>
these<WH428> mentioned<WH935> by name<WH8034> [were] leaders<WH5387> in their families;<WH4940> and their fathers' houses<WH1004> increased<WH6555> greatly.<WH7230>
And they went<WH1980> to the entrance<WH3996> of Gedor,<WH1446> even<WH5704> to the east<WH4217> side<WH4217> of the valley,<WH1516> to seek<WH1245> pasture<WH4829> for their flocks.<WH6629>

And they found<WH4672> rich<WH8082> and good<WH2896> pasture,<WH4829> and the land<WH776> was broad<WH7342> and quiet<WH8252> and peaceful;<WH7961> for those who lived<WH3427> there<WH8033> formerly<WH6440> [were] Hamites.<WH4480> <WH2526>

And these,<WH428> recorded<WH3789> by name,<WH8034> came<WH935> in the days<WH3117> of Hezekiah<WH2396> king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> and attacked<WH5221> their tents,<WH168> and the Meunites<WH4586> who<WH834> were found<WH4672> there,<WH8033> and destroyed<WH2763> them utterly<WH2763> to this<WH2088> day,<WH3117> and lived<WH3427> in their place;<WH8478> because<WH3588> there was pasture<WH4829> there<WH8033> for their flocks.<WH6629>

And from them, from the sons<WH1121> of Simeon,<WH8095> five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> men<WH376> went<WH1980> to Mount<WH2022> Seir,<WH8165> with Pelatiah,<WH6410> Neariah,<WH5294> Rephaiah,<WH7509> and Uzziel,<WH5816> the sons<WH1121> of Ishi,<WH3469> as their leaders.<WH7218>
And they destroyed<WH5221> the remnant<WH7611> of the Amalekites<WH6002> who<WH6413> escaped,<WH6413> and have lived<WH3427> there<WH8033> to this<WH2088> day.<WH3117>
